R2-5 BY ADV. SRI.K.ANAND R2-5 BY ADV. SRI.BENNY ANTONY PAREL R2-5 BY ADV. SRI.T.M.MUHAMED HAFEES OTHERS PRESENT: SRI. C.S. HRITHWIK, SENIOR PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ee Crl.MC.No.8395 OF 2019 (H) 2020/KERBI2 3 ORDER Dated this the 8th day of January, 2020 The petitioners are accused in Crime No.403/2019 of Chittoor Police Station, Palakkad for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 341, 323, 324 and 308 read with Section 34 of the IPC. The defacto complainant and injured are respondents 2 to 5. They have appeared through counsel and filed affidavits to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled and that they do not have any grievance against the petitioners. There is also a counter case registered against the respondents herein as Crime No.402/2019 of the same Police Station which also has been settled. A report has been obtained from the Investigating Officer regarding the settlement. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. There is no public interest involved. In the result, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire proceedings in Crime No.403/2019 of Chittoor Police Station stands quashed under Section 482 Cr.P.C and the accused are discharged.
